Name: Three Finger Battle Arena
About the game: Three Finger Battle Arena is a game where you can punch your friends into orbit, then swing away like nothing ever happened! Features include: Three game modes! (and growing) Grapple and punch! Up to 8 players! The game modes currently are: Battle Arena - Avoid falling off platforms and knock other players off the stage. Floor is Lava - Battle Arena but lava is slowly rising, avoid it! Spleef - Smash blocks and punch your friends, try to make the other players fall in the lava.
